name: Outbalance
description:
Outbalance is a cooperative puzzle game in which you must figure out how to guide balls to their respective basket. As you play, you and your partner have to figure out which key affects what elements of the level. Communication is vital to be successful. Good Luck!

Credits

  • Dominik Jeurissen (Developer)
  • Yu-Jhen Hsu (Developer)
  • Peyman Hosseini (Developer)
  • Nirit Ben-Meir (Art & Design)
  • Erin Robinson (Background Music)
  • Jamie Turner (Background Music)
